titles.title: DHS Transnational Criminal Investigative Units Supplemental Pay Act
DHS Transnational Criminal Investigative Units Supplemental Pay Act
To authorize the Director of U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement to provide stipends to certain vetted foreign members of Transnational Criminal Investigative Units, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

bill.summary:
DHS Transnational Criminal Investigative Units Supplemental Pay Act
This bill authorizes U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement to provide stipends to vetted foreign members of transnational criminal investigative units.
